title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Common answers about using the downloader safely and for free.

usage.q: How do I use the downloader?
usage.a: Paste the video link into the input box and click download. We will fetch a clean link for you automatically.

platforms.a: YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter (X), Douyin, Kuaishou, Bilibili and other popular platforms are supported.

free.a: Yes. All downloads are free to use.

contact.q: How can I send new requirements?
contact.a: Email celebrateyang@gmail.com and we will review your request.
